name: Subconscious (Mydel)
description:
Hey ho! 
We present our first game-Jam project. 
It is a story of a boy with exceptional mind-penetrating power. 
We tried to reflect how the mind of each living creature can translate into its own planet.
We will try to interest you with the gameplay we have created.
We encountered a lot of problems when creating it, for the first time we managed to complete the project in its entirety in such a large group.
Total participation in our work, applause 5 people.
Two weeks of every free moment spent on grinding code, assets and fixing a lot of bugs, really many.
They were working on the project:
-michalflog (Lead developer)
-Mydel(Developer)
-Vincer(Developer)
-Dukioo(3D Graphic Artist) https://www.artstation.com/otwin
-MrArt(2D Graphic artist)
Just to mention, the two programmers were working on a fully completed project for the first time in their lives. So we are counting on words of encouragement :)
We are very happy that we were able to finish it on time. 
We had a great time doing it, complaining about ourselves many times.
But most of all, we have learned many important lessons that will surely affect on our future projects.
We hope you will like the game and we will surprise you with some interesting solutions!
And of course we are waiting for a feedback!
